website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable 4-piece soft-sided luggage set that is decent quality for occasional travelers.
pros: Available in 4 different colors and includes 3 different sizes of suitcases plus a matching duffel bag
Each suitcase includes a telescoping handle and wheels
Lightweight and made out of quality fabric
cons: Won't hold up long for those who travel frequently

customer_reviews.title: well constructed and it held up great on our trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 piece set for my wife for our trip to Europe. We travel some but not a whole lot so we were looking for luggage that would hold up and wasn't too expensive. We shopped around quit a bit and finally ordered this set. Because of Amazon's return policy, we figured that when it arrived if the luggage didn't measure up then we could return it. Well, the luggage is very attractive, well constructed and it held up great on our trip. Based on the experience of having used it, I highly recommend this luggage set. It can't be beat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Thank You and Have A Wonderful Day! Customer Service Warranty Dept
customer_reviews.text: This set did not last a year. I filled out a claim with the company on July 17th and never heard back from them again. Here is there email: Dear Customer, We have received all required documents needed to process your claim, and are currently reviewing your claim. Please allow 10-14 business days to process your claim. Thank You and Have A Wonderful Day! Customer Service Warranty Dept. Traveler’s Choice 2805 South Reservoir Street Pomona, CA 91766 Tel: 909.529.7688 x287, x236 Fax: 909.529.7622
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Rocc

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT recommend this product at all. I packed the largest bag for my trip. The wheel broke BEFORE I made it to the airport and it was the first time I used it. It's unbelievably inconvenient when your arrive at the airport with a 40lb bag that doesn't roll. It's not worth the risk. Worst purchase I made this year total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The red is bright and largest case is large!
customer_reviews.text: Update: love them, they held up very well on our cruise. No snags, tears or rips. Zippers slide easily. Lots of pockets. Love the shoe compartments. May order another set down the road. *** Just received the set today. We ordered the red so much to my surprise when they came out of the box black with red fronts. They look pretty sturdy, but won’t know until we use them. We are taking a cruise so they’ll get thrown around some. Really like the sizes, especially the 29”... very nice size!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish/ Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this luggage. The bright red makes the luggage look very stylish. Suggestion spray with scotch guard a few times. I first used (one piece) of my luggage in January. Well, I had two nice size dirt stains. Wasn’t happy! However, with the scotch guard sprayed on a week prior to that trip, I came home used Simple Green and the stains are gone. Durable and rolls well.
customer_reviews.author: Neo1

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could be happy about these.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these suitcases to replace old suitcases that I've had for many years. When i was finally able to open up the box and check out my new luggage i was very disappointed to find that the lining of the suitcases is coming apart in several places. I've surpassed the return window, sadly, due to health issues beyond my control so now I'm stuck with them. Buyer beware, while these are affordable, they arent made well.
customer_reviews.author: Redfly5937

customer_reviews.title: Ripped along the seams after one trip!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so upset that I purchased these. Pretty as they are, they're not good quality! I went on a business trip and used them ONCE and one of the handles ripped out of the seam on the carry bag and the seams are ripping on the suitcases. I didn't even over fill! Now it's too late to return and get a refund because my return window closed. I bought them earlier than my trip was scheduled, to ensure I had luggage and now I just wasted money! Beyond upset!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had almost 3 years now. These have made several trips to Mexico, several to Germany, and many trips around the US. All are still in great condition, other than being scuffed and kind of dirty from all the trips. Wheels still intact and roll nice, no rips, zippers all intact and work well. I have had luggage that cost 5 times this amount, that broke on the first trip. So I was surprised these have far outlasted the expensive ones. And they are still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Handles and wheels break easily.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a long time and as long as I only carried them on and controlled who handled them they were fine. But when they were checked one of the wheels *that is connected by plastic mounts) broke off when it was checked we now had a heavy wasted suitcase. Then the larger one was checked and when they stacked the suitcases the handles inside were bent and broken (not protected from the outside weight). Bad and inexpensive design. Now have a carry on bag only. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BWhit

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: Omg I thought I was going to be pleased with this luggage. First I only received 3 pieces. The handle got stuck, the wheels wouldn't roll properly, the luggage ripped in 2 different areas inside and out. It got dirty fast as well. I had to send it back. Oh yes and what the hell was up with those "luggage locks". It was a diary lock at best. I could've used chewed bubble gum to keep my luggage locked instead. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Ruiz/Yulonda Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Samsonite Gorilla Toys
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED -- we finally are chucking these for other suitcases. We stand by our original comments below... not worth the money. After some us, these are not worth the money spent. The wheels are easily damaged where they no longer roll, or roll cock-eyed. Handles stick as well. The semi-'metal' framing is very week and will easily become deformed if you carry the suitcase on the side strap.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: We bought two set of this luggage and went on one trip- we only took the two larger suitcases of each set. After one flight, both larger suitcases had large tears to the back of the suitcase and the handle on one of the larger one no longer functions- there are also two smaller years on the smaller suitcase. Quite disappointed at having to buy new luggage for our upcoming trip.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great value. This is the second set that I am getting, as I needed some additional suitcases. It is not heavy duty but it serves the purpose and holds well for a regular traveler. The old set is still good after 4 years--and I've been carrying books and whatnot. One of the handles on the old set did fall off, but the wheels are holding incredibly well and there are no tears or breaks (and yes, I overfill them often). I also like the versatility of combinations accommodating all the baggage needs from 3 months overseas to day trips.
customer_reviews.author: MrCookie

customer_reviews.title: If suitcases break they will not replace
customer_reviews.text: I made one trip with the set of luggage and the bigger suitcase was not overweight, and the part that holds the wheel onto the suitcase broke off before we even got to our destination we have one flight and a layover and it was broke by the time we got it before we even got to where we were going. Contacted them they would not replace
customer_reviews.author: sheila newman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, excellent size - get the black ones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a really worn-out set of luggage that had done me good service over 12 years. The different sizes in this set have worked out great, and the smallest bag is perfect for overnight. Can't beat the price--I paid much less for this than for my now-retired set. Recommend to anyone looking for a good quality set of luggage at a reasonable price. UPDATE: Still love these and they are holding up beautifully. However, I have the red set and my mother has a similar orange set, and they get really dirty from airline travel. I would probably get the all-black set if I were to buy them again, since those wouldn't show the black marks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Zipper rips
customer_reviews.text: Really frustrated at this point. We were given this luggage as a wedding gift! Used it on our honeymoon and everything was fine. We got home and the zipper had already torn. One trip and our bag was unuseable, unable to get ahold of any sort of customer service to try and work this out. Due to it being a gift and getting it early we can do a simple return through amazon, which we don’t want to return it because we love the luggage, w whist want a replacement for the messed up zipper. Really wish customer service was easier to get ahold, would’ve been a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Good set for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving 2 stars due to the fact that the luggage that I ordered was not the luggage that I received. I purchased 2 sets but each a different color. The first set arrived just as I had ordered but the 2nd set is a different brand & not the color I ordered. But all in all the luggage will serve it's purpose for which it was intended. Good set for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: gbadrich

customer_reviews.title: Only used them once before they ripped.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the luggage. Was really excited to use them. But used them on one trip and the back ripped apart. Luggage was underweight and nothing major was happening just trying to use the handle and it ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Awesome luggage great quality awesome deal what a score this is why i love shopping on Amazon such great buys . Well build quality bags beautiful in person love the vibrant color .I bought two set of these .great buy. happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: LovingLife

customer_reviews.title: Headed for a trip to DC - Can't Wait to try this out!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage came and I was and am thrilled. First of all FAST delivery! It is even "better" in person than in the picture. I love the fact all of the cases are "deep", and you can unzip a portion of the top of the to make them even "deeper" if need be! Nice, sturdy handles, roller wheels seem good. The luggage itself is pretty light weight even though seem to be made very sturdy. I like that also. I am very pleased for the price! If it holds up as I think it will for my trip, I will definitely give them a try again if I needed anything such as this.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Steele

customer_reviews.title: luggage loss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take to Europe. I took only the very largest one. I was on a tour bus. After only a few days, the bag was delivered to my room with the handle broken. It was just a matter of time before some idiot was going to start picking it up by the rolling handle. My wife had some really strong cord that she took off some sacks from purchases and I was able to "jerry-rig" a handle the luggage handlers could use. I won't be able to take this on another trip. Seems like a lot of money for one bag and one trip.
customer_reviews.author: novice#1

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed!!! Don't buy this set!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I ordered this set for a trip to Michigan. When we arrived we had to pick up all of our belongings off of the baggage claim because the zippers on two of the cases split..Lots of damage to our clothing.. Then the pull handle on the largest case broke making it extremely hard to transport..We ended up throwing this set out in Michigan and purchasing a quality set for the return trip home..If I could rate this a 0 I would.. Don't buy it! Learn from my expensive mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because my old luggage is black. I have so many differnt things hanging from it to try to distinguish it from the rest of the black luggage. Now my luggage is easy to spot without having to even look at the name tag. All the pieces are expandable so you can fit alot into them. Some people complained about Fed Ex but mine came full intact not even a tear in the box. I highly recommend this set since it is very well constructed. Also the colors are not as bright as they appear. The red is a true red but the black on the front is more like grey, very nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: gailanne

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The luggage only has 2 wheels each so it does not roll without being tipped as some of the expensive luggage does. This is a quality product for a good price. It stood up to some rough treatment on airline delays and weather and came through for me. This is a great budget item that will not break the bank or its own zippers.
customer_reviews.author: lutterback

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this suitcase until tonight. The handle broke on the 21" suitcase as my husband was carrying it into the house. I have had it for 4 years and did not use it heavily. Never took it on an airplane. Used it mostly for weekend travel which is only a few times a year. I am very disappointed in this product. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great color (I got Red). Deep bags. Very pleased with the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have used these numerous time. The quality is good. All zippers work and seem strong, they do not hang up at all even when overstuffed. The bags a re deeper than I expected which I love! The red color is very pretty. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: It's luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of luggage! Sizes are fit to normal flight regulations for checked and carry on sizes. I have NOT USED the smallest bag yet, only the largest three. Some people say this set breaks or came damaged. Mine is perfect after some heavy use, no issues at all. Can't beat the price for what I got either. All four pieces also fit inside each other for easy long term storage. That was nice to see.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price to performance ratio
customer_reviews.text: They survived one 16000 mile round trip and costed less than 80 bucks... whats not to love? Judging from their current condition, they might even take a few more trips. We used these on international travel and the suitcase size was accepted in Air India flights without any hassle. The rolling wheels are still intact and make it much easier to slide them around. These are also fairly lightweight allowing you to maximize your luggage.
customer_reviews.author: manbearpig

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We took these on a big trip down south. We took all four because we were visiting family. Everything packed nicely and store nicely
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of luggage in 24 years, I was skeptical to purchase these online as I could not play with them, however when I received them, I did inspect them throughly and I am completely satisfied. Thus far I have used them 4 times and have had zero issues. Zippers are great, the pieces interlock nicely, wheeling them is nice, the style and color are nice, the material is nice. The toiletries bag has ample storage nd has a mesh pocket inside that is large and a zippered pocket outside...I love this set!
customer_reviews.author: flower child

customer_reviews.title: Dual top and side carry handles and bottom grip makes lifting easy THIS LUGGAGE IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: i purchased new luggage.. US TRAVELER NEW YORK 4 PIECE SET. Adjustable add-a-bag strap allows an additional bag to be carried effortlessly;High visibility light gray interior lining and tie down straps; Interior zippered mesh pocket and dual shoe pockets Expandable (25% more packing capacity) ;Internal retractable push-button handle system; Inline skate wheels for smooth rolling Multiple front zippered pockets for travel documents and magazines;Dual top and side carry handles and bottom grip makes lifting easy THIS LUGGAGE IS GREAT, i used for a disnet trip with 4 kids and it had plenty of space for all our clothes very derable and stylish i highly reccomend this luggage, also very well priced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One trip and it is permanently stained - not happy!
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase on the left was used this past week for one round-trip flight between Tucson and St. Louis, and it is permanently stained and dirty-looking. The suitcase on the right is another size from the set and shows what it looked like before traveling. Seriously? Dear U.S. Traveler - if your products are intended for travel, why are they immediately ruined by travel? If you buy these, it would be in your best interest to buy the black ones.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gier

customer_reviews.title: best luggage set for the money
customer_reviews.text: this luggage set was friggin great! the price was less than anything you can get at a retail store and combine that with 2 day free shipping and the deal is great! the luggage is actually really sturdy and is holding up great! if you were to buy a comparable set at JC P or Dillards, you'd spend triple what these cost and that isnt even taking the shipping charges you'd prolly hafta pay! GET THIS SET IF YOU NEED A GOOD SET OF LUGGAGE AND DONT WANNA SPEND THE SAME AMOUNT OF MONEY YOUR VACATION COSTS!
customer_reviews.author: fat chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of this luggage for a trip overseas this past week. When we collected our bags after arriving to our destination (Barcelona), the top handle on the largest piece had broken, and several places on several pieces of the luggage had already begun tearing. Even though there is a warranty, since we'll have to pay the S&H, it's unlikely we'll spend the money for additional poor-quality luggage. Next time, we'll go with a more recognized company for our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I love these would buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are sized so they fit inside of each other for storage, they’re beautiful sturdy and well-made. Easy to recognize at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The color is vibrant and the construction is very sturdy. This is my second set of this set, I bought this set for my kids to share when we go on vacation. It is easy for them to pull the luggage on their own. (they are 11 and 13) It is a well made set and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Verona8122

customer_reviews.title: Good Suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Been to England and back a couple of times. Couple of domestic trips and still very functional especially the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: Good sized pieces, vibrant colors, and sturdy enough to get the job done. The small roller bag I have already taken on an international trip with no issues. The largest bag I have packed and taken the whole family's things for trips of a few days multiple times with no issues. I fully expect this set of luggage to last many trips and a few years!
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Tolbert

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't get these becuase some reviews said they weren't durable for flights. But the price made me take the risk and it was worth the buy. The look amazing, spacious and hold everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Alight
customer_reviews.text: This is a set of luggage I would buy for a young teenager. The luggage is very nice LOOKING. They simply served a purpose, I used them only once, when traveling on the airplane. They didn't do so well going through the airport, and didn't look the best after getting back home. I am ashamed to take them with me any other flying trip. They would be good to take on a quick car trip, when you can hide them in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in February and used it for the first time today, June 1st. The whole handle broke apart after one 2-hr flight. Find out that the return window has closed and we are stuck with broken luggage one use in. Do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jody Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: We used this luggage set for a two week road trip this summer and we are very pleased with the quality and functionality of these bags!! They can hold a LOT of stuff and have what seems like an unending amount of pockets for stashing things and organizing all of your luggage. We have had no issues whatsoever with the construction of any of these bags and feel that they were well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathan1

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for a recent family trip to Alaska and they were fantastic. I was a little nervous buying luggage sight-unseen, but once again the Amazon Review community came through. These pieces look smart, were functional, and will hold up for many years of family trips.
customer_reviews.author: MDob

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags for the first time and had so much trouble with the handle on the large bag not releasing to pull up or go down. Flew from Ohio or Portland and had to open the bag, move contents to the side, unzip the partition and manually push the pins to get it up or down. So frustrating. I looked over many sets, not just here but other sites and settled on this one for the reviews, price and reputation of Amazon. Very, very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 full sets of Delsey luggage, which my husband and I use to travel. Purchased this 4 piece set for the kids to share (22 and 17) on upcoming trips. Though we have not yet traveled with it (so I can't speak to it's durability in regard to flying), I can say that on initial inspection the quality appears to be very similar to that of a Delsey type product. Cannot beat free super saver shipping.
customer_reviews.author: SBraun

customer_reviews.title: Supper Sturdy and Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and super durable. Price is way too great. Will recommend to others and will again if needed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rabia Raja

customer_reviews.title: Busted on my first trip!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy that I received this luggage set just in time for my trip to NJ. It made it through the initial flight, but when I picked it up from baggage claim in NJ, the handle would no longer pull out on the large bag. It was very very frustrating, and I had to end up throwing it away. I knew not to expect a lot, because of the price, but I did expect the luggage to make it through my trip!!! Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Woman

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I travel at least twice a year and this set is Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This 4 piece set was wonderful, I filled each suitcase to the max (50 ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed several large suitcases for my travel. This 4 piece set was wonderful, I filled each suitcase to the max (50 lbs.) each. There was a little wear and tear after my first use however, it held up to my expectations after reading all the reviews. If you're looking for a matching set of luggage for under $100 then this is it! I don't expect this set to last me for years and years but I needed something affordable and somewhat reliable, it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Like many other buyers had stated
customer_reviews.text: Like many other buyers had stated, the handles are cheap. I had purchased one for my daughter and one for myself for our trip . Since the shipment came later than expected, we were packing the night before. I did not notice the handle on her largest luggage did not function at all. Trying to navigate through 3 different airports with 6 bags and the largest one without a handle was difficult, to say the least . It was quite frustrating and a hassle. I will spend a little more next time and get better quality luggage
customer_reviews.author: duckyluv7

customer_reviews.title: Good set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: The luggage was priced very reasonable for my travel needs. Naturally, you get what you pay for, so doubt that it will hold up for continuous flights and baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: JCrosby

customer_reviews.title: Held Up Nicely!
customer_reviews.text: The colors were eye catching, very easy to spot! Durable! After a two week trip to Europe then to Florida the following week, the pieces held up well. Luggage handlers can be brutal, but the handles, zippers (I didn't even attempt to use the locks!), luggage rollers and extenders all got back to me in tact and without a hitch. Got more traveling to do, but so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: this luggage is fantastic. my wife and i went to italy for ...
customer_reviews.text: this luggage is fantastic.my wife and i went to italy for 10 days and really beat the piss out of theses bags with all of the walking we did in rome and florence.i was waiting for the wheels to fall off or a handle to break but they lasted the entire trip and are still in great condition.they were definitely a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright red color and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve used the carryon and the bag and they both fit a lot of items in it. It survived 4 different plane rides and the buckle to attach another suitcase to the carryon really came in handy while walking around the airport. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set in red and when I opened it the luggage looked cute but the large suitcase already had a small hole in the back. Needed to use it 2 days after receiving it. First use the suitcase ripped in 2 places. Used heavy duty tape to keep it together. Looks like a nice set but don't buy it. Made cheap!
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Superb Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This luggage set is great. It is sturdy and elegant looking. I was able to pack more than enough in the large suitcase for my 3 day weekend. I like to take several outfits to choose from and shoes to match--the largest suitcase was more than enough. I also used the carry on bag. It held all my toiletries. Thank you Amazon for listing.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyboot

customer_reviews.title: The large suitcase is great. The smallest is basically a brief case that's ...
customer_reviews.text: The large suitcase is great. The smallest is basically a brief case that's useless for travel. The middle two are good, but one is slightly too big to carry on and the other can be carried on but slightly too small to pack anything significant.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on first use
customer_reviews.text: I was initially really excited about this set. It is a good size with nice pockets and looks sleek. But on the first use, the seam of an entire pocket is ripped (and no, it was not overloaded) so I question the quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: O.K. for light travel only
customer_reviews.text: I have used this luggage a few times. The issue I have had is with the handles. They are attached with some sort of cheap aluminum or something - anyway, the aluminum has actually torn, and the handles have come off. This luggage is good for light travel, but don't expect to get more than a few uses out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Suitcases are very sturdy and durable. I only wish I had purchased ones with 4 wheels for better maneuverability in airports.
customer_reviews.author: mom&nurse72

customer_reviews.title: Bag tips forward when full
customer_reviews.text: I used the smallest of these bags for the first time last week for a three day trip and was very disappointed that no matter how I loaded the bag it tipped forward and would not stand upright on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built and great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set was bought for my 10 year old son. It has lasted almost a year and is still in great shape. So I would say this is really well built. And a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: William Charles Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with durable materials, heavy duty zippers and sturdy wheels. Very impressed with the quality for the price. Plenty of compartments and pockets. Haven't used them yet for travels but they seem like they'll be perfect! Spent a lot more on a previous set I purchased and these are MUCH nicer. Definitely would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: This gear is okay for here and there traveling. ...
customer_reviews.text: This gear is okay for here and there traveling. Although it does have a lifetime warranty, I did find not able to hold up to the abuse of the airport crew team manhandling the luggage. Isn't a huge issue, these weren't that expense anyways and they have been reliable luggage.
customer_reviews.author: DaSpoonerSF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bar at the bottom of the suitcases. It makes it easier to lift when you want to hold it from both the top and bottom at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah LeBel

customer_reviews.title: It is really great and so far seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the price for this luggae. It is really great and so far seems durable. we have used it already a fair amount and it has withstood the abuse of flying and being packed in cars etc. wheels and handles still working on all. good price and good quality
customer_reviews.author: RAGirl

customer_reviews.title: FABRIC RIPS APPART VERY FAST
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS NOT MADE TO LAST, FOR IT'S NATURE AND PURPOSE THEY SHOULD, WHAT A CONTRADICTION!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Santos

customer_reviews.title: Fair Set of Bags
customer_reviews.text: This is a fair set of luggage bags. The main problem encountered was with one of the handles breaking apart when being lifted up. The bag was the mid sized one and was lighter then the large bag. I do not understand how the other bags have fair to good quality handles and the mid sized bag had a poor quality handle
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: very cheap. one cruise and one flight later they ...
customer_reviews.text: very cheap. one cruise and one flight later they are about worn out. we will have to replace them before our next trip. mental note......just spend the money and buy real luggage next time....
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t left yet and it’s ripped.
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this luggage for our Disney trip and it’s beautiful. We are heading to Disney today, all is packed, we haven’t even left yet and the largest bag is already coming apart. We can’t turn back now so fingers crossed this holds up for the flight there and back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous handles
customer_reviews.text: For the price this seems great...until all the handles rip off on all three roller bags (never used the small bag). The handles are sewn down and attached to the bag with some metal fasteners in such a way that when the handle fails (detaches on one side) the weight of the bag pulls the handle and mangled metal fastener through your hand which results in a deep, bleeding, gash. Very pleasant experience. Also, just about all the zipper dangely things have come off (not a frequent flyer, just poorly done). Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Not real durable
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas gift quality was OK for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lola Williams

customer_reviews.title: Price was good for something we use one week a year
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as our first set of luggage. Price was good for something we use one week a year. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for packing up your life and moving 1500 miles away
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, seems to be in good condition, i'll be traveling to vietnam next year so i'll update on how it'll hold up after my trip. but the color and everything so far is amazing and very vivid. feels really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Linh nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I tried them because of the price and reviews. They are very cheap and terrible! The handle has broken off one of the pieces after just a 2nd or 3rd use. I like luggage that is rugged. These bags are handled quite roughly when loading and unloading. I grabbed my bag from the baggage clainm belt and the handle came off and it even cut my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: for the price
customer_reviews.text: for the price i got a very good deal. the luggage held up great and will be good for our next vacation plus many more. getting the bags from the carousel was easy to identify being red on only one side. More room in the cases than we were use to having and we pack enough for a week when we go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for travel. However, even before haven't got out home in the day I went to airport, the handles of tow of luggages had broken, while the weight for each luggage was well less than airline asked. The quality is such bad. My advice to all: do NOT buy this package, nor this brand (US Traveler New Yorker". Never never!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phi Ge

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this luggage! You cannot beat this price and it is all very durable and has lots of good pockets. Also the color choices are great and the colors are bright so they're easy to spot at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: AAM

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color, nice material.
customer_reviews.text: Veey nice color and material. Every peice Just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter luggage set
customer_reviews.text: It won't win the BEST luggage contest. But it is easy to use, easy to pull, and easy to store. Not to mention it looks nice and easy to identify during luggage claim. Highly recommend. Also, the seller, Wayfair take care of everything. One of the best seller that I worked with. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, useful luggage. Very deep to fit a lot and tons of pockets and zippers for additional items.
customer_reviews.author: SmileyLoveBug

customer_reviews.title: My New Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I made a good choice when I purchased this set last month.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel L. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I thought
customer_reviews.text: On one flight..the entire from cover for the outside pockets ripped open on one of our bags. The midsized bag to be specific. Zippers kept getting stuck and the rolling handle didn't open without bending the bag. Not as sturdy as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: phouthone sam vongphakdy

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: This product is sooo cheaply made. The front is red however the back is this cheap black looking material. The very first time i used them they were sooooo dirty (probably the baggage handlers fault). CHEAP!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the handle broke on the large suitcase on my very first trip. There is also a tear in the back. I wouldn't recommend this set, but then again I guess I got what I paid for. Next time I'll invest more on a higher quality set
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Scully

customer_reviews.title: Seemed nice but broke on first trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a cruise we were going on. 2 of the 3 bag handles broke off with our cabin information after we dropped off our bags and then had to go to the lost luggage area to find them the next day. Not a great way to start a trip. The now missing handles also made comming home a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: res927

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use for a recent cruise it held up great. Did not require a great investment. My daughter bought a much more expensive Swiss Gear single piece for what we paid for the whole set and the handle broke the first day. Not as we'll made!
customer_reviews.author: huffmarv

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took these on a flight and they held up well. The only issue was the pull on one of the zippers broke in half somewhere along the way. Overall a very nice set for the price with lots of room and very easy to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: After looking at the local stores for luggage that would fit our needs I decided to try Amazon, and found this luggage set. It gave me all the choices that I needed for different travel plans that I have, Love the bright Red color very roomy inside . Cant wait to use them .
customer_reviews.author: Karin Louise Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Does only have the two wheels so maneuvering isn’t the easiest like one with four wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Taryne Hiebert

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used these to travel overseas. They were perfect for her trip.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Diefenthaler

customer_reviews.title: Great set and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these....i work at Jcpenneys and was thinking about getting some there...but I always look on amazon before I purchase big items...well let's just say that for one piece at Jcpenneys I could almost buy 2 sets of these and for the same quality or better on amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these bright suitcases. Our only issue is one of the wheels broke on the smaller suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!
customer_reviews.text: Very good luggage for the price. The quality is very good. The variety of sizes is great. We would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lauralovesbooks

customer_reviews.title: Was not what we had hoped for. One trip ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not what we had hoped for. One trip overseas and two are almost unusable. Bought a set for my daughter too so we’ll see how those hold up with just a US flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We've used this set for once on a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We've used this set for once on a 7 day 2 stop trip and have had zero issues. Seems well built for its price range.
customer_reviews.author: flyinmx5

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them yet but they look very nice and sturdy! Will update after my trip next week. Definitely suggest buying them ahead of time to air them out because they do come with a very strong odor!
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyB_71

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage set! Once I ordered this set off of Amazon, the shipping was fast and everything was in perfect condition! I needed new luggage for my flight to New York and let me tell you, i got the set in the color red and it definitely made me look stylish and classy at every airport! Everything worked accordingly and nothing was broken, even after a whole day of switching flights and checking in baggage! I would definitely recommend this luggage set to anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars bcoz it is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Give the luggage set a 4 stars. I used it on international travel couple of times and overall the bags are sturdy & safe. However, one of the bag was torn (minor) at the bottom. It is understandable that the quality is not top notch given the price of the entire luggage. The color (the red was a vibrant red) & fabric looked the same as it is on the image.
customer_reviews.author: Terrific reviewer!!!

product_meta.title: U.S. Traveler New Yorker Lightweight Expandable Rolling Luggage, Red, 4-Piece Set
product_meta.description:
Functionality and innovation come together in this versatile luggage from the U.S. Traveler New Yorker luggage set. Each rolling upright features, telescopic handle system, recessed inline skate wheels and expandability. The interior has full lining, multiple pockets and tie-down straps that secure your belongings. Product Dimensions: 29 inch H x 17 inch W x 10.5 inch D (expands to 12.5 in. D) 11.8 lbs.; 25 inch H x 15 inch W x 9.5 inch D (expands to 11.5 in. D) 9 lbs.; 21 inch H x 13.5 inch W x 8 inch D (expands to 10 in. D) 7.7 lbs.; 15 inch W x 10 inch H x 7 inch D 2 lbs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Functionality and innovation come together in this versatile luggage from the U.S. Traveler New Yorker Collection. Constructed of lightweight and durable tear-resistant fabrication, the set has multiple high capacity bodies that allow for maximum organization demanded by today's active travelers. Product Features: Crafted from durable and shinny dobby fabrication EVA foam front panel for a clean and tailored appearance Adjustable add-a-bag strap allows an additional bag to be carried effortlessly High visibility light gray interior lining and tie down straps Interior zippered mesh pocket & dual shoe pockets Expandable (25% more packing capacity) Internal retractable push-button handle system Inline skate wheels for smooth rolling Multiple front zippered pockets for travel documents and magazines Dual top and side carry handles Bottom grip makes lifting easy Upright: 29” H x 17” W x 10.5” D (expands to 12.5 in. D) Upright: 25” H x 15” W x 9.5” D (expands to 11.5 in. D) Upright: 21” H x 13.5” W x 8” D (expands to 10 in. D) Tote: 15” W x 10” H x 7” D
feature_bullets: Crafted from durable and shiny dobby fabrication, EVA foam front panel for a clean and tailored appearance
Adjustable add-a-bag strap allows an additional bag to be carried effortlessly
Internal retractable push-button handle system, Inline skate wheels for smooth rolling

Upright: 29” H x 17” W x 10.5” D (expands to 12.5 in. D) – Product weight: 11.8 lbs., Upright: 25” H x 15” W x 9.5” D (expands to 11.5 in. D) – Product weight: 9 lbs. Upright: 21” H x 13.5” W x 8” D (expands to 10 in. D) – Product weight: 7.7 lbs., Tote: 15” W x 10” H x 7” D – Product weight: 2 lbs.
